posts.title: I Built My Own Business OS Because No SaaS Could Connect My Entire Workflow
posts.description: Eight modules, one Next.js app, zero context switching. Why I stopped using five separate tools and built a unified system for CRM, invoicing, projects, timesheets, expenses, and reports.

posts.title: I Deployed My Full Business App on a $18.66/Year VPS. Here Is Every Problem I Hit.
posts.description: Five Docker containers, Cloudflare Tunnel, Zero Trust access control, data migration, and performance tuning -- all on a 2.4GB RAM budget VPS. A sequel to the Ansible lockout story.

posts.title: The Model Is Not the Bottleneck: How Qwen3 32B Beat a Frontier VLM at Document Extraction
posts.description: Why we scrapped our Gemini 3 Pro single-pass pipeline after under 40% accuracy and built an adaptive LangGraph graph with Qwen3 32B VL that hit over 90% -- at lower cost, with better debuggability.

posts.title: I Got Locked Out of My Own Server During Chinese New Year. Then I Automated Everything.
posts.description: Three lockouts during a holiday engagement taught me more about Ansible, server hardening, and disposable infrastructure than any tutorial ever could. Here is the playbook that survived.

posts.title: RAG Is Not Enough: How We Built Dual-Mode Document Intelligence
posts.description: Why basic RAG fails for enterprise documents and how we built a dual-mode system combining passive retrieval with agentic reasoning and VLM-powered document processing.

posts.title: The 5-Layer AI Guardrails System That Catches What GPT Misses
posts.description: How we built Sentinel, a progressive AI safety middleware with 5 input layers and 4 output layers that balances catch rate, latency, and cost.

posts.title: Why I Left Actuarial Science for AI (And Why My Stats Background Is My Secret Weapon)
posts.description: A personal career journey from actuarial science to leading AI solutions, and why statistical rigor is the most underrated skill in modern AI engineering.

posts.title: How We Built 15 AI Agents That Actually Work in Production
posts.description: Behind the scenes of AiMod's multi-agent DataOps platform: decision routing, bounded autonomy, human-in-the-loop patterns, and the architecture lessons from building 15 LangGraph agents.

posts.title: Building a 6TB Data Warehouse From Scratch: Lessons I Wish I Knew Earlier
posts.description: War stories from building a PostgreSQL data warehouse at Credit Bureau Malaysia: schema design, partitioning strategy, Airflow gotchas, and performance optimization at scale.
